title: Login issue
description: User unable to log into the system using correct credentials.

title: Payment failure
description: Credit card payment is failing for multiple users.

title: Slow website
description: The homepage takes more than 10 seconds to load.

title: Email not sent
description: Order confirmation emails are not being delivered.

title: Mobile app crash
description: iOS app crashes on checkout screen.

title: Incorrect invoice
description: Customer received an invoice with wrong amount.

title: Search not working
description: Search functionality returns no results even when items exist.

title: Refund delay
description: Refund requests are taking more than 7 business days.

title: UI bug in dashboard
description: Charts overlap when resizing browser window.

title: Password reset issue
description: Password reset link is not valid after 5 minutes.

title: Order not delivered
description: Customer did not receive the package even after marked delivered.

title: Feature request
description: Customer requested a dark mode option in the app.
